message.body: Any plans for the weekend?
Hey sorry I couldn't answer. I'm at the mall with my mom and brother searching for a dress shirt for him.

Hahah you and the mall! You sure you're only shopping for your brother??? Jk jk :) I was calling to see if you're doing anything tonight since I might not get to hang out the rest if the weekend and classes start next week.
*of
Aw no! I just get here so I probably won't be home till around 9. I don't think I'll wanna really go out. But you can't do anything for the rest of the weekend? When do you start?
I have work tomorrow night and I might go down to the shore with my family on Sunday.
I start on Tuesday. It's okay, maybe next time :)
Have fun at the mall!!!
Aww. And ohhh!!! School again. Dun dun dun!!
Bought a dress. MUAHAHAHAHA!!
I know!!!
Hahah How am i not surprised?!!!
Let me guess, Express?
Whoa....you're good.
It's a gift ;)
It's a good gift. Haha. Everything's 40% off. How could I not?
What??? Damn, that's a good deal!
It is!!! I bought a dress and a romper. I would've bought another dress but it was all tangled in the hangers. I didn't have he patience.
Hahahahahah that's probably one of the best reasons I've heard for not buying a dress!
You should've seen it. And there was only one small so it's not even like I could grab another one. It was just lost forever.
Awww that sounds like a sad movie! Ohhhhhh I can visualize you in a scene like that and it'll be like a funny video! We can go viral!
